title: Rockets, Lakers, Clippers, and the Trade deadline,
itunes:title: Rockets, Lakers, Clippers, and the Trade deadline,
description:
Colin explains why the Houston Rockets are trapped by Russell Westbrook, why he's impressed with the Clippers, why the Lakers need the keep their young players, and the rest of the NBA trade deadline moves. Guests include Chris Broussard, Oliver Luck, Andy Reid, Rich Bucher, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
